page.title: 09The Old Railway Line Part 2
page.content: ran away without a driver up the line to Chelleston. About 1 mile from the station a train crashed into them. Three people were killed on the line between 1906 and 1943. In 1943 some American rolling stock ran away down the line to Cloud Hill from Ashby. At Tonge station in the 1940's there was some army tanks on the train,the engine would'nt stop because of the weight and fell over. On the 14th of June 1955 the most serous accident was when 29 wagons ran away from the new Lount Colliery and finished up in Cloud Hill pilled 4 trucks high. The line was eventually closed down on 22nd September 1930. There are still lines around Tonge, but the old line has gone, but still the track provides beautiful walks,wildlife and plants.
